sentences.sContent: The large warehouse backs on to the river.
sentences.sContent_eng: The large warehouse backs on to the river.

sentences.sContent: I stored up the old furniture in the warehouse.
sentences.sContent_eng: I stored up the old furniture in the warehouse.
sentences.sCn: 我把旧家具存放在了仓库里。

sentences.sContent: Bales of cotton were piled up in the warehouse.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bales of cotton were piled up in the warehouse.
sentences.sCn: 大捆大捆的棉花堆积在仓库里。

phrases.pCn: 仓库管理，仓储管理；仓库治理

remMethod.val: ware(器皿) + house(房屋) → 放器皿的房子 → 仓库

words.tran: 储仓；（商业银行所提供的）周转性短期贷款
把…存入仓库；使落栈（warehouse的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: a large building for storing large quantities of goods
